xml.bio: Jule Martinez Ruiz is a graphic designer in the Department of Computer & Information Science & Engineering at the University of Florida. They possess a B.A. degree in Education from the University of Puerto Rico, Cayey Campus, and experience in illustration and graphic design. Their interest is to make learning visually appealing and accessible. Currently, Jule lends their creative effort to a variety of projects.

degree.subject: Education, English as a Second Language
degree.school: University of Puerto Rico, Cayey Campus
